text: Yaad rakho woh log apney seenon ko dohra kiye detay hain takay apni baaten (Allah) sau chupa saken. Yaad rakho kay woh log jiss waqt apney kapray lapettay hain woh uss waqt bhi sab janta hai jo kuch chupatay hain aur jo kuch woh zahir kertay hain. Bil yaqeen woh dion kay andar ki baaten janta hai
